CustomField.description: The unique ID of a category on the inSided community. You can use this when reporting to get data from a single category even if the category name has changed. Note: this ID can change if a topic is moved to another category.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unique ID of a category on the inSided community. You can use this when reporting to get data from a single category even if the category name has changed. Note: this ID can change if a topic is moved to another category.
CustomField.label: Topic Category ID
